about_us_text:
We provide Both Spiritual and Material Education, to nurture the body, mind, and soul of our students.

To provide academic education, we follow the MSBOS & NIOS boards of Education.
- For Std. 5th to Std. 8th - MSBOS Board (Maharashtra State Board for Open Schooling)
- For Std. 10th - NIOS Board (National Institute of Open Schooling)

As followers of Shri Bramha Madhya Gaudiya Sampradaya, we also teach our kids the rich tradition of spiritual knowledge handed over to us by our revered Guru Shishya Parampara, by covering the subject matter given by HDG A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Srila Prabhupada.

Spiritual syllabus for the whole year covers following Topics:
- Srimad Bhagavad Gita
- Srimad Bhagavatam
- Mahabharata, Ramayan
- Isopanishad (Commented by Srila Prabhupada)
- Pranam Mantras and Stotras

Along with classroom teachings, kids also enthusiastically do Harinam Sankirtan in nearby villages, and try to uplift the spiritual environment of the nearby areas.

Gurukul also strives to teach practical Farming, Sports, Music & Cooking as well, with a view to create an environment where kids with different abilities can learn and grow up as a positive contributor towards society in general.
maharaj_text: Our Gurukula is dedicated in service to our revered Guru Maharaj, whose teachings and blessings are the foundation of our mission to nurture the next generation of devotees.
